content.rendered:
Besart Hajrizi
Insta Innovation Center Associate

Besart Hajrizi

InstaBuilt

Session: Wood-Metal/Construction Innovative Transformation and R&D-based Challenges

With a strong aptitude for business networking and consulting across Europe, especially in the DACH region (Germany, Austria, and Switzerland), I have a proven track record of building strategic relationships and driving business growth. As a Senior Account Manager and Founder/CEO, I excel in establishing connections, identifying new leads, and turning them into successful business ventures.

Backed by over 15 years of professional experience, I am also deeply passionate about education, mathematics, data science, and research. My academic background in Telecommunication Engineering has shaped my analytical mindset and strategic approach to problem-solving. Throughout my career, I have embraced multiple roles, combining my passion for business with my commitment to education and innovation.

As a Lecturer, I’ve had the joy of imparting knowledge and nurturing the intellectual growth of students in mathematics, data science, and research. In parallel, my role as Founder/CEO reflects my commitment to transforming innovative ideas into impactful ventures.

With extensive experience in Project Management, I have successfully led and executed projects with a focus on seamless collaboration, efficient resource utilization, and the timely delivery of high-quality outcomes. My professional philosophy centers on a dedication to innovation, and I am passionate about staying ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving landscapes of mathematics, data science, and technology. Through Strong Network LLC, I strive to create a positive impact by harnessing the power of data and research.

I am always eager to connect with fellow professionals, collaborators, and individuals who share a similar enthusiasm for innovation, business development, and education. Let’s connect and explore opportunities to collaborate and drive positive change together.

 

Company Profile

InstaBuilt is a pioneering offsite construction company specializing in the design, production, and assembly of high-quality modular homes and communities. With over two decades of expertise, InstaBuilt combines cutting-edge technology with sustainable building practices to deliver cost-effective, efficient, and environmentally friendly housing solutions.

As a leader in modular construction, InstaBuilt leverages precision engineering and automation to manufacture prefabricated building components in a controlled environment. This method significantly reduces waste, minimizes construction timelines, and ensures superior quality compared to traditional building methods. Our innovative approach allows us to provide customized, scalable, and energy-efficient structures that meet the evolving needs of the real estate industry.

Our Mission

At InstaBuilt, we are committed to redefining the construction industry by offering smart, modular solutions that enhance the way people live and work. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of offsite construction while maintaining the highest standards of design, functionality, and sustainability.

Core Values

Innovation – Pioneering new technologies to optimize modular construction.
Sustainability – Reducing carbon footprints and promoting eco-friendly materials.
Efficiency – Streamlining construction processes to maximize time and cost savings.
Quality – Delivering durable, high-performance structures.
Customer-Centric Approach – Crafting tailored solutions to meet diverse housing needs.
